subject: Citi Field (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: As Citigroup grovels for a bailout from public funds, the Mets insist the name of their new ballpark, Citi Field, will not change.
snippet: As Citigroup grovels for a bailout from public funds, the Mets insist the name of their new ballpark, Citi Field, will not change.
